variable.cascade_impact: Without this: No API calls work, no agents run, no data fetched

variable.name: NEXT_PUBLIC_WS_URL

variable.name: SERVICE_ID
variable.description: Stable service identifier for backend-to-auth communication
variable.cascade_impact: CRITICAL: Service ID mismatch causes authentication failures, must be stable value "netra-backend"

critical_learning.discovery: SERVICE_ID with timestamp suffixes causes authentication failures every minute
critical_learning.note: Auth service must use hardcoded "netra-backend" not environment variable with timestamps

incident.description: SERVICE_ID with timestamp suffix caused auth failures every 60 seconds
incident.impact: Service authentication mismatch, blacklist validation failures
incident.logs_pattern: Service ID mismatch: received netra-auth-staging-[timestamp] but expected netra-backend

variable.name: SERVICE_SECRET
variable.description: Inter-service authentication secret for backend-to-auth communication
variable.cascade_impact: CRITICAL: Complete authentication failure, circuit breaker permanently open, 100% user lockout, system unusable

critical_learning.discovery: Missing SERVICE_SECRET triggers MockCircuitBreaker permanent failure
critical_learning.note: This was "error behind the error" - auth failures were actually circuit breaker architecture flaw

incident.description: Missing SERVICE_SECRET caused complete staging outage - circuit breaker permanently open
incident.impact: 100% user authentication failure, complete system unusable
